name: Maze Meltdown
description:
You are stuck inside a maze. Your job is to find all the relics lost in the maze. Once all the relics are found, make your way to the exit to finish the game. But you won't alone on your way back...

Controls:
- WASD to move
-  Avoid coming in line of vision of the enemies
- The more relics you collect the more dangerous the map
- Once all the relics are found, the exit door will unlock  (Visible particles)
- Pay close attention to the audio playing

All game art was made by me in 48 hrs

All game music and SFX was taken from www.freesound.org

Relic SFX: https://freesound.org/people/GowlerMusic/sounds/262260/download/262260__gowlermu... Enemy Music and Scream: https://freesound.org/people/GowlerMusic/sounds/262257/download/262257__gowlermu... Game Theme Music: https://freesound.org/people/GowlerMusic/sounds/262260/download/262260__gowlermu...
